description:
Tree pruneing in the Barnsbury conservation area.

T1,T2,T3,T4: X4 Alders, crown reduce by 20% and deadwood. 
T5,T6,T7,T8: X4 Cherries, crown reduce by 20% and deadwood. 
T9: X1 Norway Maple, crown reduce by 20% and deadwood. 
T10: X1 Fig to be cut back to boundary line. 
T11: X1 Sycamore to be cut back to boundary line. 
T12, T13, T14: X3 Limes lift to 5m and deadwood. 
T15: X1 Ash to be cut back to boundary line. 
T16, T17: X2 London Planes, cut back upto 2m of branch lenght over pavement, 10 % crown thin and deadwood.
T18: X1 London plane, cut back upto 2m of branch lenght over school roof, 10 % crown thin and deadwood.
T19: X1 Cherry, 15 % crown thin and deadwood. 
T20, T21: X2 Silver Birch,  lift by 2m from ground level, 15% crown thin and deadwood.

All trees are located on the grounds of St Andrews Primary school, N1 0LB.
decision_conditions: The tree officer will be informed 48 hours in advance of the date that work will commence. The tree officer would like to be on site before work begins.
